summary: An Indian adaptation of Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" focusing on two sisters of opposing temperaments.
cast: Ajith Kumar|Tabu|Mammootty|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Abbas|Srividya|Shamili|Pooja Batra|Chandrakala|Arvind Krishna|Lakshmi|Manivannan|Dino Morea|Unnikrishnan Nampoothiri|Raghuvaran|Anitha Rathnam|Nizhalgal Ravi|Samir Sarkar|Senthil|Sreeja|Malaysia Vasudevan|A.R. Rahman
keywords: inheritance|age difference|marriage proposal|sister sister relationship|foreign language adaptation
title: Kandukondain Kandukondain
